body_html:
@d0k do you have any hypothesis of what the bug could be?

The status you're seeing is CUDNN_STATUS_MAPPING_ERROR, which hints at an internal error in cudnn, so the bug is most likely there. But it's hard to say, there are a lot of moving parts.

body:
> @d0k do you have any hypothesis of what the bug could be?

The status you're seeing is CUDNN_STATUS_MAPPING_ERROR, which hints at an internal error in cudnn, so the bug is most likely there. But it's hard to say, there are a lot of moving parts.
